title: By the King, a proclamation for incouragement of the further discovery of the popish plot
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
publisher: Printed by John Bill, Thomas Newcomb, and Henry Hills ...,
notes: "Given at our court at Whitehall the thirtieth day of October 1680, in the two and thirtieth year of our reign."
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
